sentences.en: After some to-ing and fro-ing, Elsie and the children moved back to London.
sentences.cn: 来回搬了几次之后，埃尔茜和孩子们又搬回了伦敦。

sentences.en: Branches waved wildly to and fro.
He continued to move to and fro over the soft carpet.
sentences.cn: 他继续在柔软的地毯上来回走动.

sentences.en: He grew weary of running to and fro on the short track.
sentences.cn: 他开始对在这节短轨道上开来开去有些厌倦了.

sentences.en: He rocked a little to and fro , and chewed at his finger.
sentences.cn: 他轻轻地前后摇摇啃着他的手指.

sentences.en: Kuei Chang - lin was walking to and fro on the veranda waiting.
sentences.cn: 桂长林还在游廊前徘徊.

sentences.en: She rocked the baby to and fro.
She saw small boats passing to and fro on that glittering highway.
sentences.cn: 她看到许多小船在这耀眼的河道上来往.

sentences.en: She stood up and began to pace to and fro.
sentences.cn: 她站起身，开始来回踱步。

sentences.en: Small boats busied to and fro.
The boat was rocking gently to and fro in the water.
sentences.cn: 小船在水中轻轻地来回摇荡。

sentences.en: The bus travels to and fro between London and Brighton.
sentences.cn: 这趟公共汽车来往于伦敦与布赖登之间.

sentences.en: The flower seemed to quiver, and then swayed gently to and fro.
sentences.cn: 花儿似乎在颤动, 接着轻轻地来回摇摆.

sentences.en: They travel to and fro between London and Paris.
sentences.cn: 他们奔走于伦敦和巴黎之间.

sentences.en: Those boats are prepared for waftage to and fro.
sentences.cn: 那些船舶是准备用来来回运送货物的.

sentences.en: Trucks and cars were shuttling to and fro on the highways.
sentences.cn: 公路上卡车和汽车正来往奔驰穿梭.
